introMarkdown:
"With a deploy frequency of one release in just over a week, the docusaurus-theme repository demonstrates our commitment to rapid iteration and responsiveness to user feedback."

During the period from January 19 to January 26, 2026, the docusaurus-theme repository saw its first release, version 0.3.4, marking a significant milestone in our development cycle. This release introduces enhancements that improve user experience and streamline documentation processes, which are critical for technical contributors looking to adopt our tools effectively.

- The release of docusaurus-theme 0.3.4 is crucial for platform engineers as it optimizes documentation workflows, enabling faster onboarding and integration of new projects.
- With no existing stars, the initial release provides an opportunity for contributors to shape the repository's direction, fostering community engagement and collaboration.
- The focused development on docusaurus-theme highlights our strategy to enhance documentation capabilities, which is essential for SREs to maintain operational excellence and reduce incident response times.

### Summary
The release of docusaurus-theme 0.3.4 marks a significant step in enhancing documentation capabilities for technical users. This update provides an opportunity for platform engineers and SREs to improve their documentation processes, ensuring better compliance and usability.

### Next Steps
- **Run Performance Benchmarks**: Test the docusaurus-theme in your existing documentation setup to evaluate any performance improvements. This will help identify enhancements in load times and user experience.
- **Review Documentation**: Examine the updated documentation for docusaurus-theme to ensure compliance with your organization's standards. This will aid in maintaining consistency and clarity across all technical documents.
- **Adopt New Components**: Integrate any new components introduced in docusaurus-theme 0.3.4 into your projects. This can lead to improved automation and streamlined workflows.

highlights:
## Release Summary

No user-facing features or fixes in this release.

Internal: CI dependencies were refreshed, including actions/checkout from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 and 8 other GitHub Actions bumps; development tooling was updated with @ts-dev-tools/react from 1.9.11 to 1.9.14 and @types/react to 19.2.9.

## Breaking change(s)

No breaking changes.
